Class RoundTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.RoundTracker

  • public class RoundTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the RoundTracker of a single game

      • addToRoundTracker

        public void addToRoundTracker(int index,
                              Die die)
        Adds a given die to the roundtracker, in a given index (that is a round) Used by ToolCardController because LensCutter toolCard needs it
        Parameters:
        index - it's the index user wants to add the die to
        die - it's the die user wants to add to the roundtracker

      • updateRoundTracker

        public void updateRoundTracker(java.util.List<Die> remainingDice)
        Increments current round, fills roundTracker with remaining dice from draftPool. It's called when the round ends
        Parameters:
        remainingDice - the remaining dice in the draftPool that must fill the roundtracker

      • isVoid

        public boolean isVoid()
        Checks if the round tracker is void (if there is no die)
        Returns:
        true if there is no die in the round tracker, false otherwise

      • modelViewCopy

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Die>> modelViewCopy()
        Used by ModelView, in the constructor, when it's needed to copy the whole Board to send it to a client
        Returns:
        a copy of attribute dice
